snippet.title: There Was A Dream - Early Access Launch Trailer | STEAM
snippet.description:
BUY NOW There Was A Dream on #Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1001950/There_Was_A_Dream/

There Was A Dream is a single-player adventure game for PC features farming, crafting, combat, puzzle elements, and sandbox exploration. Embark on an adventure at your own pace, where your actions shape the world. Turn the dream into a nightmare and vice versa at your will. Explore these parallel dimensions characterized by different situations, missions, npcs and gameplay.

#trailer #adventure #openworld #dream #nightmare
